price: "Lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, an yi mana wa'adi ga wannan, mũ da ubanninmu, daga gabãnin haka. Wannan bã kõme ba ne fãce tãtsũniyõyin farko."
arabic: لَقَدۡ وُعِدۡنَا هَٰذَا نَحۡنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا مِن قَبۡلُ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: laqad wuʿid'nā hādhā naḥnu waābāunā min qablu in hādhā illā asāṭīru al-awalīna
